armor_activate.title: Activate armor
armor_activate.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors

armor_activate_crouch.title: Activate armor
armor_activate_crouch.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors

mask_activate.title: Mask
mask_activate.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=2}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Mask off","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=2}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.mask 0
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=3..}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Mask off","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.mask=3..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.mask

Energy.Pulse.title: Energy Pulse
first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=1}] run tag @s add energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run tag @s remove energy.pulse
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse

Armor_edit.title: Armor Edit
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.personalize.things=1}] run title @s actionbar {"text":"Personalize on","color":"#00aaaa"}
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.personalize.things=2..}] run title @s actionbar {"text":"Personalize Off","color":"#00aaaa"}

flight_unlock.title: Flight Edit
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.flight.set

flight_speed.move.title: Choose Speed
flight_speed.move.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors

flight_speed.title: Increase speed
flight_speed.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3

remove.flight_speed.title: Decrease Speed
remove.flight_speed.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=9..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3

failsafe_unlock.title: failsafe Edit
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.failsafe.set=1}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Failsafe on","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.failsafe.set=2..}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Failsafe off","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.failsafe.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.failsafe.set

Telekinesis.title: Telekinesis
commands: execute at @s as @e run effect give @e[tag=!superior.shockwave,distance=..5] minecraft:slowness 1 255 true

Hyper_speed.title: Increase speed
Hyper_speed.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=0..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=6..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3

remove.Hyper_speed.title: Decrease Speed
remove.Hyper_speed.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.speed=3..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.speed 3
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.flight_speed=9..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.flight_speed 3

choose_armor.title: Choose Armor
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=1}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Choose Armor on","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=2..}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Choose Armor off","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.armor.set

choose.armor.move.title: Choose
choose.armor.move.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors

next.armor.choose.armor.title: Next armor
next.armor.choose.armor.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.prev.iron.man.armor=0..13}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.prev.iron.man.armor 1

prev.armor.choose.armor.title: Prev armor
prev.armor.choose.armor.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.set=0..}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.prev.iron.man.armor 1

choose.armor.set.title: Set
choose.armor.set.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors

arms_unlock.title: arms Edit
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=1}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Arms on","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=2..}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Arms off","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.arms.set=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.arms.set

arms.move.title: Beams
arms.move.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 0

arms.1.title: Next armor
arms.1.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=0..1}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1

arms.2.title: Prev armor
arms.2.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=1..3}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1

break.title: Break
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.break
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=1}] run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Break on","color":"blue"}]
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.break matches 0.. run title @s actionbar ["",{"text":"Break off","color":"blue"}]

scan_enemies_enable.title: Scan enemies
commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.scan.enemies=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.scan.enemies
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.actived.perm matches 0.. run damage @s 2 minecraft:player_attack
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.closed.armors=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.closed.armors

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.closed.armors=1..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.closed.armors 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.closed.armors=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.closed.armors

commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded

ark.upgrade.thing.1.title: Ark reactor update
commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded 1

ark.upgrade.thing.3.title: Ark reactor update
commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded 2
